alert.note: Alert for Aguada; Aguadilla (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 14 at 6:08PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Aguada and Aguadilla. * WHEN...Until 700 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 508 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Aguadilla, Aguada, Caban, Luyando, San Antonio and Rafael Hernandez. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
